title: 91/591/EEC: Commission Decision of 5 November 1991 amending Commission Decision 90/613/EEC approving derogations provided for by Italy from certain provisions of Council Directive 77/93/EEC in respect of seed potatoes originating in Poland (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 5 November 1991  amending Commission Decision 90/613/EEC approving derogations provided for by Italy from certain provisions of Council Directive 77/93/EEC in respect of seed potatoes originating in Poland  (Only the  Italian text is authentic)  (91/591/EEC)
